overview: Mark is Senior Vice President of Strategic Planning for Comcast Corporation. His primary responsibility is the development of new business opportunities particularly from emerging technologies. In addition, he serves as the Strategic Advisor to CIC. His extensive experience in the technology sector is a valued resource to the fund. Mark offers guidance on the strategic fit of potential investments with the Comcast family of companies. Mark has served on the boards of Primestar Partners, Teleport Communications Group, Eastern TeleLogic Corporation, and Faroudja Research. He holds a Bachelor of Science with honors in Management Science from Case Institute of Technology and is a distinguished graduate of Carnegie Mellon’s Graduate School of Industrial Administration.
